properties.Adaptation: After nearly 15 years of resettlement, Manwan resettled villagers have found ways to solve problems and strengthen their adaptive resilience to reconstruct their communities.
After nearly 10 years of resettlement, Dachaoshan resettled villagers have found ways to solve problems and strengthen their adaptive resilience to reconstruct their communities.

Resettled communities from Xiaowan are relatively recent, so it is likely that problems in the community may have just started. People tried to solve their own problems in new ways so that they can cope with their new social networks.

Resettled communities from Nuozhadu were relatively new but, clearly, show a similar answer pattern to Manwan and Dachaoshan resettled communities. However, literature published after the survey was conducted indicated some resettled communities also underwent impoverishment (Zhang et al., 2013).
